title: NPC Dialogue Document
description: A Minecraft Bedrock Edition NPC dialogue definition document. Dialogue files define conversation scenes for NPCs, including dialogue text, buttons, and commands that execute when players interact with NPCs.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this dialogue file. Use '1.20.80' or later.

fields.title: NPC Dialogue
fields.description: The NPC dialogue definition containing scenes.

fields.title: Scenes
fields.description: Array of dialogue scene definitions. Each scene has a scene_tag, optional text, npc_name, buttons, and commands.
